website_summaries.verdict: A unique minimal design that maximizes shelf space for a large audio setup.
pros: Open shelving provides more space than enclosed towers
Easy to move around and assemble

customer_reviews.title: Finishing Touches For Office / Studio!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Simply impressed. Very gorgeous and professional at the same time. Perfect fit and look for my studio ! It was easy to assemble as well . .not my strongpoint but if I could do it anyone could do it. The quality is amazing ! The finish is very clean and sturdy, nothing uneven or rocking back and forth. The only issue I had was the packaging. I didn't care for the clean-up afterwards with the foam balls all over the place. I had to vacuum at night. lol. I vacuum on the weekends when its daylight outside. Not after work. However after the clean-up and I placed the stand it was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: John Anthony Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit!
customer_reviews.text: The assembly on this wasnt TOO bad, just make darn sure youve got the glass centered and sittin against the rear bar before setting it all the way down. Those suction cups (not oiled) do NOT allow for lateral movement after the glass is pressed down. But the result, when paired with the Whalen corner desk and Z-line Manager chair is awesome. Awesome, if your obsessive about everything in a room matching, that is.
customer_reviews.author: Rossman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, could be better, but looks ok, assembles easily, and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Just installed it, looks fine so far, but one of the shelves has a part that's loose.. I just do not care to deal with replacing.. also some of the chrome is.. well, has few areas that are peeling a bit.,.. overall, looks nice, an ok product, but if i bought it locally, i'd be there getting a replacement, or replacement parts at least (side rails and bottom shelf frame). Assembly was easy, and the set has one extra of every screws, that's a nice touch. Overall not disappointed, but could be a bit better on QC I guess. We will see how it fairs once I put all the equipment on it...
customer_reviews.author: Grzegorz Tokarski

customer_reviews.title: I thought there had to be something that looks as good (if not better) and cost less
customer_reviews.text: After looking at media stands around my city, I thought there had to be something that looks as good (if not better) and cost less. I was seeing 'ok' media tables and stands that were starting at $299. I decided to search Amazon and came across this little gem. WONDERFUL media stand. Looks great (the curved wood is unbelievable) and it is very sturdy. Cable wheels and hidden cable run (down the back). Great purchase. If you are looking at this Whalen AVTEC48-TC and are just not sure.....forget about it! Great purchase. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Ketterer

customer_reviews.title: Very strong, well-packaged, looks good. EZ to move. Real glass shelves.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stand, best access to back of units. Cable storage on the back is, um, "optomistic" but not a big deal for anyone who knows how to use zip-ties. Nicely packaged, good instructions BUT YOU MUST READ ALL INSTRUCTIONS CAREFULLY BEFORE YOU START! I did not, and had to back-track a bit. Light wt but heavy-duty functionality. Even looks good in a corner. I put plastic furniture sliders under the feet before loading it, which REALLY HELPS when you need to move it out from the wall to add or subtract a piece of equipment, or change cabling.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Buckler

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of furniture. Very easy to put it together. Only challenge I had to overcome was to fix the vacuum suction cups. It would not go easily into the holes. I tried something different. Boiled the water in a small bowl in microwave for 30sec - 1minute. Dipped all of them for more than 2 minutes. Voila and they all went in easily through the holes. Just my 2c.
customer_reviews.author: P. Iyer

customer_reviews.title: Great rack except for deep equipment.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good solid rack. Lots of space vertically, which is awesome. Great air flow. My only complaint is that my receiver is fairly deep, and as a result the back of it butts up against the vertical support in the rear middle. That blocks use of some of the ports on the back of the receiver. Fortunately i was able to plug my wires in on the left and right, but that is a design defect if you have audio equipment that is really deep like me. Measure your equipment and get the depth of each shelf so you confirm you have plenty of space.
customer_reviews.author: Addy

customer_reviews.title: Very good shelf and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is really really nice and very easy to put together. I have 2 of these side by side in my living room and I have a fireplace in my room with a wall brown/grey stone and these shelves are fighting it for attention they stand out that much in a good way. The quality of this shelf is really good with the wood and black shelf mix. I would highly recommend and I would buy more if I had the room.
customer_reviews.author: Jr

customer_reviews.title: and this is perfect. Plus
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this tower. I bought a new TV stand, but the places in the cabinet where I would put my video game consoles were covered in the back. Every time I have put electronics, whether it be consoles or computers, or whatever, inside an area where the back is not open, they overheat and break. So I wanted something completely open, and this is perfect. Plus, it looks great in my living room as well. It looks like a piece of real furniture that you'd pay a lot more for if you went to a furniture store. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jay P.

customer_reviews.title: Strong and good looking at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Well made and for a good price. The instructions were clear and well thought out. The screws were in individual packets and labeled. Two gripes: One is the foam packing is horrible. It disintegrates easily and sticks to everything due to static. Second is the stickers put on the parts to identify them. They are very difficult to get off without an adhesive remover. It holds all my heavy audio equipment and is a good-looking unit.
customer_reviews.author: John Stebbins

customer_reviews.title: Nice set up
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my audio system ... affordable and good looking 10+
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Del valle

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Component Rack!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rave enough about this rack. It is extremely high quality and well made. It was shipped well and packaged to protect everything, hardware separated and labeled flawlessly. Assembly easy with clear instructions. I am ecstatic with this purchase. Buy with high confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Lawdog

customer_reviews.title: Great stand for audio/video components
customer_reviews.text: Great stand for audio/video components. The assembled furniture looks very nice, is very sturdy, and the metal/wood accents fit with most home decors. Assembly was straight forward, and the instructions were concise and legible (in english). Mine arrived undamaged, and in a timely fashion. I am giving it 4 of 5 stars because of the internal packaging. Styrofoam littered my home's flooring took several independent passes with a vacuum to dispatch. A very minor grievance, admittedly, but the extra time spent on clean up was enough for me to warrant docking the item a star.
customer_reviews.author: William Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Of all the A/V stands I've ever owned, this was one of them...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking finished product. Assembly was slightly annoying, but doable in an hour. Fit and finish were slightly off. Also, it's 2016, why are we still peeling stickers off that leave shredded remnants? I wanted to punch someone.... The glass has a dark laminate underside to achieve a nice look, but 2 shelves came scratched. It comes with a black marker to fix this, but it does not work as intended. An underwhelming endeavor, but it does look decent afterward.
customer_reviews.author: AV Ninja

customer_reviews.title: Whalen 48" High Audio Video Tower
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice stand. Putting it together did involve some minor but annoying difficulties however. For one thing the directions say to put each wooden side piece up first, and it's almost impossible to do this until all the shelves are in, because the side pieces tend to fall over. So you have to awkwardly use your leg to hold them still, or have a second person to hold them as you tighten screws. Also - your hands can get really tired trying to press 20 suction cups into the shelves - 4 per shelf. But that said - it's not complicated, the directions are clear, and it's a very pretty stand for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Review Maven

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shelving.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. They go with the shorter yet wider shelves. They put the parts in a plastic sleeve and each compartment is numbered. They give you +1 for each part in case you lose one. Biggest pain are installing the suction cups. I had sore thumbs after assembly. Finished items look great.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good design, bad packing
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and general look of this av storage, but the packaging from the vendor was seriously lacking. The glass was not broken, but scratched up pretty badly. Since it is black, it shows up quite a bit. It wasn't too bad to put together, with the only slow part putting in the suction cups for the glass. The trick with that is to put them in at an angle so they pop in. I'm not sure I would buy their glass products again after this.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Holt

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice piece of furniture, it has served it's purpose. You will need to put it together, it wasn't too complicated. The shelves are not very sturdy, meaning you can't put heavy objects on them or the shelf will bend or give forward like it wants to slide forward. For the price it's nice!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Kim

customer_reviews.title: I love the looks of this media stand
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks of this media stand! Not difficult to assemble. They only reason I did not give 5 stars is because the cable management system is too small to handle a lot of cables like I use. However, I knew that going in because you could tell from the pictures there was not a lot of room. Looks great though. Love the style
customer_reviews.author: Pen Ken

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice looking in the livingroom or in a den even
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice looking in the livingroom or in a den even, Not to difficult to put togeither either, My was shipped with a badly bent metal leg which is welded on the bottom metal bracket, which would have needed to be rewelded, instead of returning it though i just made due and made a leg and attached it after removing the welded peice, it was not any fault on the seller but the shipper, the box was pretty beat up, thankfully no glass was broken, other then that, its solid, and very nice to look at plus plenty of space for components, and for less then 100 when i bought it its a amazing deal.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: but this cleaned it up and looks great. I have a statue of Harley Quinn at ...
customer_reviews.text: Out TV area had gotten out of control with all of the devices connected to it, but this cleaned it up and looks great. I have a statue of Harley Quinn at the top that I got from the special edition of Suicide Squad, and the rest of our devices spread throughout the rest of the shelved (security system, Apple TV, Blue-ray Player, XBox One, Cable box). The wires looks nice and tidy behind it and the only thing I have left is to install the earthquake bracing (I need a stud finder to do it properly). Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Miyake

customer_reviews.title: After 10 minutes of correcting the assembly all was good to go
customer_reviews.text: The stickers for top and bottom were swapped. I started to assemble the device and quickly realized that everything wasn't going to align properly. After 10 minutes of correcting the assembly all was good to go. This product looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Brozik

customer_reviews.title: The product is actually nice enough and would work well for a what-not display
customer_reviews.text: The product is actually nice enough and would work well for a what-not display. However I purchased this item for my kitchen audio-video set up and after i had assembled it i discovered a warning notice that indicated that I could not set a TV atop this unit. It was advertised under the video shelving section and the box indicated it was an audio-video unit. the information advertised is misleading. I had to return it as i had no other use for it.
customer_reviews.author: henry d hale

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tree
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with the weight of my Empire 398 vintage record player, Fischer KX-200 tube amplifier, and vintage Girard CD-player. Does not easily pick up vibrations and has held solidly for over a year and a half. Easy access to all components and streamlined to give a modern yet natural touch to your audio setup.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN HOBERG

customer_reviews.title: Definitely used, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this used. There definitely are blemishes, and a couple of the metal frames that the shelves sit on are pretty bent out of shape. Assembly was overall easy, except for attaching the wood sides to the metal shelf frames (again, due to them being bent). Looks great though and seems very sturdy. Also, easy to level out due to the adjustable feet on the wood sides.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Looks great once assembled.
customer_reviews.text: The media center comes unassembled and requires some time to put together. Once I put it together it looks very nice and high quality. 2 points that could improve the overall experience: 1. Easier assembly 2. better cable management in the back (bigger conduit). All it all, pretty good and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: M. A.

customer_reviews.title: and I SUCK at putting stuff together normally
customer_reviews.text: Just set this puppy up for my basement TV / DVD / PS4 center. This has got to be one of the easiest pieces of furniture I've ever put together.... and I SUCK at putting stuff together normally. The only tricky thing was getting the plastic sucker cups for the shelves put in right at the end, bit of a pain to force them in there. Anyway, looks great and happy with the purchase. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: RichC

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, sturdy and an exceptional value !
customer_reviews.text: This was a surprisingly well made item; the many positive reviews are validation of it's construction and value. I have generally had poor results with Chinese produced, assemble it yourself stands and furniture. This was a happy exception. It turned out to be sturdy and quite attractive. I recommend it highly. I would pay another $ 100 for a domestically produced version with a way to adjust the shelf spacing. That's the only reason I can't give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Shocknawful

customer_reviews.title: This was so easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to put together! Great addition to my room and holds my LG 40 inch TV! Time about .30 mins alone. Honestly you even get 1 extra piece in bolts screws.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great price,great product
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to put together and definitely worth it! It looks very sleek and stylish. We had it put together in an hour or so. Being able to hide cords is a plus,a few of the shelf's had a very tiny scratch but not worth returning. I will recommend this and maybe get another when we redo our basement.
customer_reviews.author: Nermal Jean

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stand. I use this for my 32 inch tv in the bedroom. My bed is pretty tall so I needed a tall stand for it. Delivery was fast and on time. Packaging was fantastic. Nothing was broken or damaged, and assembly was pretty easy with the instructions. Best buy has the same stand for $150. Do not buy from them! This is a much better deal. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful stand hampered by poor quality and confusing directions
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered MOST of my furniture online and assembled it all by myself. But this stand takes the cake for amazingly confusing assembly directions AND cheap Chinese "quality". I managed to strip out two bolts before determining that the drilling was off. It IS Chinese made so..... I would NOT buy this again. Most likely I'll throw it away. Piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Michael David Allen

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! good quality, attractive! terrific product and shelves can hold “classic” receivers, turn tables & CD players with no problem ...read directions carefully so shelves r place right side correctly or you will have to redo
customer_reviews.author: Jerseygirl22

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and my wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a smaller unit to store our A/V and game consoles on. This seemed to be the right size for it. Once it arrived I was able to assemble in in about 45 minutes. It looks great and my wife loves it! The components went on it very nicely and the cable management in the back keeps the rats nest of wires out of site.
customer_reviews.author: H Songer

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-built audio/video shelf system, and it looks good. It holds a lot of components, and it has good cable routing built-in. Some (a lot) assembly is required, and you have to place the glass shelves carefully to line them up right.
customer_reviews.author: Bish

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for low price
customer_reviews.text: Takes about an hour to construct, instructions are straightforward, and it comes with some additional hardware if you happen to cross thread a bolt. Its a lot taller than expected, but looks fantastic. A solid piece when put together.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking piece of furniture. The assembly process is not that complex. It took me about 20 minutes to completely assemble and I am very happy with the finished product. Would look good in any room with any decor.
customer_reviews.author: JJV

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy to assemble, and looks great! If youre like me and need a solution for your mess of cables and live in an apartment so you cant run them through the walls, this is a fantastic option
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Jessen

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome stand! Compact and perfect for a bedroom TV
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome stand! Compact and perfect for a bedroom TV. The product indicates you should not use as a to stand, probably for safety reasons due to the height, but I don't have toddlers at home so I think I'm safe. Very attractive. Great value, looks more expensive than it was.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Howe

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. Looks great. Only complaint is one glass shelf was chipped and one was scratched. I put the chip to the back and the scratch is covered after stuff was placed on the shelf. Box was not damaged so it must have been packaged that way.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and very good looking shelf. Easy to assemble and the instructions are clear. (That never happens) Hint, use wd-40 when putting on the suction cups for the glass shelves. Very sturdy!!
customer_reviews.author: James Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Great stand!
customer_reviews.text: This media stand was just what I needed. Wide enough to fit my audio components and sturdy enough for me to load it up from top to bottom.
customer_reviews.author: McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Clean look
customer_reviews.text: Looks really good now that it is put together. It was not easy to put together and everything did not align perfectly. One side seemed a little longer than the other but it all worked out. I left the bottom two shelves off and slid a JBL 12" subwoofer in. It fits perfectly. Everything looks so streamlined.
customer_reviews.author: adbuford

customer_reviews.title: Great looking stand,  does everything and holds projector and all related equipment,  great value, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Great stand for my projection tv, holds all of the DVD players and large Onkyo home theater equipment. Looks great, especially for the price. Easy to put together and very steady with all the shelves filled with equipment.
customer_reviews.author: GRAHAM HAZLETTE

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this purchase. Stand was fairly easy to put together. The support bracelets took some effort to screw in, but that was not too bad. The manual recommends using the Allen wrench to help with the suction cups. Another reviewer had the excellent recommendation of using a table spoon. This method works great. Only minor complaint during unpacking there was a lot of tiny styrofoam particles that seem to stick to everything. Stand is taller than I was expecting. I have a fairly large receiver and it could fit easily on any one of the 5 shelves. Overall great product for the price and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: blazin

customer_reviews.title: Really nice piece of furniture for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice piece of furniture for the price. Looks pretty classy for cheap. It is a lot bigger than I thought it would be, but worked out perfectly for me. Only giving four stars because one foot was welded crooked, so it doesn't sit level unless I screw the leg height adjustment way out. Otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: No issues with the material or the assembly process. Easier to place glass with two people, but you can do it by yourself.
customer_reviews.author: JRS

customer_reviews.title: Love this stand!
customer_reviews.text: Great stand, used it for my theater room to hold my receiver, PS4, Blu ray player and modem. Easy to assemble and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Shaw III

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to assemble and the instructions are straightforward. It's also a nice-looking piece of furniture. I have a turntable component on the top shelf and it's at the ideal height for me to operate the turntable. At less than $100, it is hundreds of dollars cheaper than the Bell'O I bought years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great Stereo Rack!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing deal! Super easy to assemble- very high quality and very attractive. I like the way it allows plenty of air flow around my stereo components- they stay cool.
customer_reviews.author: SGTForester

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this, it fits my home beautifully. Holds what I need. It was fairly easy to assemble, but you need to be handy.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shelf with excellent cable management
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Perfect dimensions for the whole unit and ample space for equipment. Cable management is excellent and provides a neat look overall.
customer_reviews.author: Shravan Sundaram

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a TV stand for my bedroom. I needed something tall enough to work with my high sleigh bed. This functions exactly as I needed, and it's nice to look at too! I was able to put it together with my son's help in about an hour. The instructions are well written and the parts neatly labeled. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: I bought this shelf and love it, it matches the desk very well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shelf and love it, it matches the desk very well. I modified it though, left out 2nd and 4th shelf and installed 1/2 plywood to fit under remaining glass shelves. Painted plywood edges with black rubber paint. It blends in very well. It also strengthed them, computer on bottom, copier on 3rd and stereo on top. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this beauty today and I absolutely love it!! It took me about an hour and a half to put together. I mostly appreciate that I had no broken glass when the package arrived!! The only flaw that I endured is one of the top left screws which connects the wooden slab and glass frame is not aligned properly, therefore the screw does not screw all the way in!! By the time I came upon this flaw I was mostly finished putting it all together, so hopefully with the other structures holding it together everything stays in one piece!! I give this product 4 stars and not 5 stars because of the before mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Whalen Furniture is GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: Great, I got it for my wife's cosmetics particulars, she has so many as well as for tablet and phone. She's not healthy and can't move around so I got this stand to be by her side when sitting on her chaise lounge chair, I have one for the electronic particulars, they're great to have.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Really nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: This stand is really nice. It was super easy to put together. I was also pleasantly surprised by the extra parts, a touch up pen for scuffs and wrenches inculded too. It was well packaged and arrived fast. It's really good quality for a $100 self assembly shelf.
customer_reviews.author: innerlight2078

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy beautiful at the same time
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made stand. It is sturdy beautiful at the same time. It is great when a company can deliver on both quality and aesthetics. I hope to buy from them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: THEDUDEJK

customer_reviews.title: Great Piece
customer_reviews.text: I really like this piece. Glass, metal, wood, you can't go wrong. The black glass gives it a high-end look. Took about three hours to assemble by myself. I do have my 42" TV on it. I did use the wall anchor just-in-case. It's in the bedroom so you can see the TV even when laying down.
customer_reviews.author: dmbPhotog

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars !
customer_reviews.text: Lol it took me 30 minutes to hook this stand up,absolutely worth buying. If need of stand that doesn't take up space,this is worth your troubles lol.
customer_reviews.author: AndyKhounsacknarath

customer_reviews.title: I really love it. I put my stereo components on it
customer_reviews.text: Although not the easiest item I've ever put together, once it was all assembled, I marveled at it's usability and beauty. I really love it. I put my stereo components on it, and it really made the music room more organized and nicer. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shelving because it was different, and it is excellent for my needs.....
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Holds tons and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This stand looks beautiful, is very stable, and holds Dish receiver, stereo amp, xbox, Wii, game cartridges, DVDs, and more! I'm so glad I found it!
customer_reviews.author: GolfGal

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't too hard to assemble. Looks nice and seems to be sturdy and high quality. Only very minor complaint is there is a lot of messy packing materials in box.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Potaczala

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and functional
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and functional, but extremely difficult to add a new piece of stereo equipment and plug it in. Maybe needs wheels or one sliding shelf for the receiver
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product looks exactly like the picture and it came with easy clear instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: This product looks exactly like the picture and it came with easy clear instructions the only bad part about that is the suction cups were not easy to push in but this product is very sturdy I love it the only reason I didn't give it five stars ✨ is because it takes forever to ship and when it does they ship it all across the world before it gets to you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a strikingly beautiful piece.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous. My mom didn't want it but I wanted it for her and she loves it. The wood is more of a medium brown that the light brown as pictured. It's a strikingly beautiful piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome audio stand
customer_reviews.text: Awesome audio stand...the assembly was easy and it looks beautiful. I purchased two to go beside my tv stand that I’ve had from Sami’s for years. The quality of the item is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. Well worth the money paid
customer_reviews.text: Set this up today. Very good quality. Well worth the money paid. Good instructions. I only need one but I'd buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dulaney

customer_reviews.title: Instructions were great!. Parts were marked to make assembly easy
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well. Instructions were great! . Parts were marked to make assembly easy. Very sturdy and attractive unit.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal T Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: I suppose that I should expect this from a Chinese product but there were two issues. The stickers on each of pieces of the assembly were extremely difficult to get off. The bigger issue is that the glass shelves were obviously damaged during the manufacturing process as you can see that someone at the factory tried to cover all of the chips and scratches with what appears to be a magic marker.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet. Not to hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: Nice cabinet. Not to hard to put together. It's a little bigger than I expected but fits the space intended. Everyone that has seen it really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Majkrzak

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: Very well masde. I was impressed with the quality of the product. Well packged. Glass shelves. Matches the wood of another item i bought. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: djstweety

customer_reviews.title: We have a Matched Set!
customer_reviews.text: Looks good with the 65 inch TV stand that matches it!
customer_reviews.author: Twin Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy with this purchase! The directions were very easy to follow. I don't think I said a single curse word. ☺️ The instructions say not to tighten down all of the screws until the end which was extremely helpful. I have ordered the desk that matches but it won't be here until tomorrow. Hoping it's just as beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised which is as it should be. Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: You could ask for more, but it would be unnecessary to do so as this rack does what it's supposed to. No complaints, no buyer's remorse.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Stand
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time..Box was damaged quite a bit but contents were well packaged and undamaged. Excellent instructions made it so simple a child could put it together. Stand is actually quite attractive once assembled and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Super Hunky

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: A bit challenging to assemble, but looks great and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Margie Wulfkuhle

customer_reviews.title: Nice and stylish rack for my AV equipment
customer_reviews.text: Nice and stylish rack for my AV equipment. It took me around 20 minutes to put it together and I've received several compliments from my guest while visiting. The wire tie-downs in the back came in very handy.
customer_reviews.author: DEL H

customer_reviews.title: A great TV media stand for those who want above eye level
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing piece. I am so glad I purchased it. Perfectly matches all of my furniture seeing that I have both black and the matching brown wood
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality media tower
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality media tower. It's the centerpiece of my room. It holds my preamp, turntable, CD player, and receiver with zero problems. And it just looks fantastic. Would recommend to anyone that wants a serious hi fi set up.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Brucke

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: This was a returned item that I got. A few parts did not fit right. So I had to modify it.
customer_reviews.author: daniel v.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made
customer_reviews.text: Its very sleek, yet sturdy. It was pretty easy to put together. Directions were clear to follow. We needed a TALL TV stand and this was almost the only option, so I was weary if I was going to like it, but I do :)
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: decent, but hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: It's quite a nice audio tower, but you have to be very clever (and follow instructions exactly) to put it together. I am happy with mine, but expect to spend several frustrating hours assembling.
customer_reviews.author: P. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our home!
customer_reviews.text: We liked the first one so much, we bought a second one for the upstairs entertainment area. The stand is sturdy, neat and very easily assembled. My husband had it assembled in less than an hour!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Looking.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking shelf for the money. Assembly was quick & easy. Mine came with a broken glass shelf, so I contacted the mfg. and they sent a new one within a week. The only think I would add are some decent feet that slide.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hall

customer_reviews.title: Shelf Review
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. I decided to purchase this shelf after buying the TV stand just like it. The black glass gives it the finishing touches.
customer_reviews.author: Jae KGarcia

customer_reviews.title: Strong and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Assembled easy. Strong system. Holds all my wood and metal power amplifier and tuner from the 90's.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando MG

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this one
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. All parts, no damage. Large enough for any reciever. Wood is a little darker than photo.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Kravets

customer_reviews.title: Pros: Sleek design for an affordable price point Can ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Sleek design for an affordable price point Can be used for all types of electronic with a max of 50 pounds Cons: Instructions could be displayed more visually Suctions are difficult to put in Had to forcefully nail some of the pieces
customer_reviews.author: Thien

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stand for the price. Straightforward instructions and very easy to assemble. Some reviews complained about the stickers but I just used a little goo gone to get them off and no problem. The stickers help in identifying the correct pieces which is necessary for assembly. No problems with any of the pieces. The box and description say to not use it as a TV but we have a large 56 inch on it with no problem. Excellent product in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Siefert

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking cabinet and is working perfectly for my sound system. It matches my MMG speakers that I have. Went together with ease and looks GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stereo shelf
customer_reviews.text: The assembly instructions were easy and not complicated like IKEA instructions. Beautiful color and it looks well in my basement. Definitely a great buy and fair priced.
customer_reviews.author: Richard K.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and easy to put together / I am female
customer_reviews.text: gets dusty daily / but beautiful enough to be worth the extra cleaning
customer_reviews.author: maggi

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and sturdy AV rack.
customer_reviews.text: This requires a little time to set-up but the finished product looks great, not to overlook is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: sonnym

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This TV stand is great, I already had my TV mounted on the wall, this stand fit perfect and I didn't even have to raise or lower my TV! Looks great and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dachshund Lover

customer_reviews.title: Awesome AV stand
customer_reviews.text: Awesome AV stand. Only complaint is that the support bars under the top shelf cut in a little on the space, and I had to put my Klipsch Reference RC-52ii center channel speaker on the second from the bottom shelf, which is a little low for my taste, but it still works well. Other than that, very sturdy, aesthetically pleasing, and a solid piece of furniture. The cord management in the back is an added plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are really nice quality look just like picture when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: PAMELA HANDSHEW/Jamy Handshew

customer_reviews.title: I will use for printer and network router stand!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and a awesome $60+ for an “open box/used” item.
customer_reviews.author: John/Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer installed parts missing and damaged!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered two of these. One came with a shelf bar slightly bent, no huge issue but not perfect. Both came with one of the plastic feet missing which makes the bottom shelf unleveled and will allow it to scratch hardwood if it is scooted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Whalen Furniture High Audio Video Tower, 48-Inch
product_meta.description: Sleek audio/video storage tower with dramatically angled bent plywood legs is ideal for use with matching console or alone to add storage and display space to any home theater arrangement. Versatile enough for use in a contemporary office setting for storing and displaying books, photos or computer peripherals. Wood legs are finished by hand in warm Tuscan brown hues. Shelves are black tempered glass that lets light in for open, bright look and are also easy to clean or dust. Whalen designs, develops and delivers quality home furniture that are rich in the value, trend and innovation. Our manufacturing expertise is highlighted by time-honored construction techniques using quality wood materials, metal, glass and upholstery. Every Whalen product incorporates industry-best features at a cost that provides today's families freedom and options when decorating their home or office. Designed for today and built for tomorrow, each piece of furniture is created for the way you live and work. Whalen products deliver.
feature_bullets: Modern bent plywood legs with Tuscany finish
Sturdy steel construction with gloss black powder coated finish
